_sText:
I just built a small room with 4 explosive barrels, which can only be blown up with the detonator button. These barrels will blow a hole in the wall to the second room.
I added some sparks to the wire for a better look.

The clue is that the wall and the barrels are respawning after about 15 seconds. After that time it can be activated again.

I just made this for a friend because he wanted to know how to handle respawning func_breakables and stuff... and i decided to share it with everyone :)

You can take a look here how respawning things work.

I hope this will help some mappers :)

Please subscribe :)

Dotty
